name: questionably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that seems uncertain, or wrong in some way: Nowadays such questionably ethical practices are almost forgotten. He claimed that he had acted questionably, but not illegally.
More examplesFewer examplesIn some cases, even departments that earned high scores had behaved questionably on the day of the inspection.They agreed that the guidelines were implemented less questionably in primary schools than in the secondary sector.From the start this was a controversial, questionably legal programme and it should now be ended.
